referenceType.description: dataset is used in this publication (IsSupplementTo)
current dataset is a newer version of the linked dataset (IsNewVersionOf)
current dataset is an older version of the linked dataset (IsPreviousVersionOf)
current datasets is continued by the linked dataset, e.g., for time series (IsContinuedBy)
current dataset continues the linked dataset, e.g., time series (Continues)
current dataset is derived from the linked dataset, e.g., synthesis dataset (IsDerivedFrom)
current dataset is a source of the linked dataset, e.g., synthesis dataset (IsSourceOf)
dataset is part of a collection (Collection)
